title: Is Email Killing Us? Sneaker Resale Grift 3.3.21
itunes:title: Is Email Killing Us? Sneaker Resale Grift 3.3.21
description:
In episode 823, Jack and Miles are joined by Stuff They Don't Want You To Know and Ridiculous History's Noel Brown to discuss a fifteen dollar minimum wage, the far-right platform Gab, the evil scam that is anti-abortion crisis pregnancy centers, how tech is not making us more productive, Qanon doubting its own conspiracy theories, sneaker resellers, New York streets, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Who is the Senate parliamentarian and why is she important?
  2. Liberals on fire over failure on $15 minimum wage
  3. We Need a $15 Minimum Wage, Not Excuses
  4. Far-Right Platform Gab Has Been Hacked—Including Private Data
  5. What “crisis pregnancy centers” really do
  6. Pennsylvania must stop funding anti-abortion programs
  7. We’re future OB-GYNs. Pa. needs to drop its support for ‘crisis pregnancy’ centers | Opinion
  8. Welcome to #ExposeFakeClinics
  9. Email and Slack Have Locked Us in a Productivity Paradox 
  10. What is the 'sovereign citizen' movement?
  11. QAnon followers newest conspiracy theory has them planning a Trump inauguration on March 4th: report
  12. QAnon Thinks Trump Will Become President Again on March 4
  13. Nearly 5,000 National Guard troops to remain in Washington through mid-March due to concerns about QAnon chatter
  14. How Donald Trump’s Washington, D.C. Hotel Feeds QAnon’s March 4 Conspiracy
  15. Will Trump Reclaim the Presidency on March 4?
  16. QAnon Isn’t So Sure Trump Will Magically Become President Again on March 4
  17. Nike Executive Leaves Following Report About Son’s Business
  18. What New York Could Do if It Took a Quarter of Its Roads Away From Cars
  19. WATCH: Konteks - Moonlit

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
